body: Hi all, I received an interesting question today about unrolling the colored mesh. The best way that I found is to create a joined Brep from the Mesh, Unroll it, re-create the mesh, and re-color it. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/XK5BrsN2RVe4wyO6wpc7JN0brVrxqDQ89NRzJ-S13gqZVJweMzKcLEthpIktttXGTvGtpwFDLAZwHz349g4JeGIax7izsby8/unrollResultMesh.png) It works but it's probably not the most efficient way of doing this. Is there a better way that I'm missing? Thanks, Mostapha
